none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 28, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 If you want me to wax on with marginally "informed" observations about '90s SE Asian DIY punk then I am definitely willing, but I think it would be better for you for crank this 1997 ANTISEPTIC recording and appreciate how different and intense that world was. These songs are so much better than my words, you know? And parts of this tape remind me of listening to DAMITOL in 1993 and that's like....that's a solid win, folks. FINALLY

seo.title: Antiseptic - Finally - Terminal Escape
